item.description: Trudeau has been battling waning popularity and the specter of U.S. trade tariffs.

item.title: Nvidia nears high, chip stocks soar after Foxconn reports record revenue
item.description: Global semiconductor stocks climbed on Monday after Foxconn posted record fourth-quarter revenue, suggesting the AI boom has far more room to run.

item.title: Trump reportedly considering important alteration to tariff plans
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is considering a plan that still would apply tariffs to all nations but narrow the impact.

item.title: Dow rises more than 350 points, Nvidia leads chip stocks higher: Live updates
item.description: Chip stocks led the broader market gains after Foxconn announced record fourth-quarter revenue.

item.title: Europe stocks close higher, autos cool as Trump denies tariff report; Chip stocks climb
item.description: European markets closed higher on Monday, driven by technology and automotive stocks.
